means: 半薪，军官退休或半退休时所领的减半薪水

sentence.Network_en: When we are off sick, we only receive half pay.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们请病假的时候只能拿一半薪水。

sentence.Network_en: You have to pay your outstanding bill before joining the scheme.
sentence.Network_cn: 在参加该项目之前必须结清余账。

sentence.Network_en: Elliott crossed the finish line just half a second behind his adversary.
sentence.Network_cn: 埃利奥特跨过终点线时仅比对手落后半秒钟。
